cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Basic 8 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Get ready to make some new friends in our Good Shared 8! Featuring 8 bunks in 30 sqm, this is the largest room at the lowest cost! Each bed has its own reading lamp and bed lockers. And guess what, the room comes with an en-suite bathroom too!

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

dorms.name: Basic 4 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Mix and mingle in our Good Shared 4! This 16 sqm room comes with 4 bunks and super fast free wifi! Each bed has a plug station and a reading lamp. No stress, it comes also with a bathroom and bed lockers!

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 7th Oct 2025 (AWST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 7th Oct 2025 (AWST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
